languages.text: "Костям ушедших должно служить живым: в обрядах, в гаданиях, оберегами. Отчего они пылятся здесь, утаенные от взоров?"
"These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"
languages.original_text: "Костям ушедших должно служить живым: в обрядах, в гаданиях, оберегами. Отчего они пылятся здесь, утаенные от взоров?"

traits.locale_text: "The bones of the dead should serve the living. They could be used in rites, divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust, concealed from people's eyes?"
"The bones of the dead should serve the living. They could be used in rites, divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust, concealed from people's eyes?"
"These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

"These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"
"These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

languages.text: "Diese Knochen der Toten sollten den Lebenden dienen. Man könnte sie für Riten nutzen oder für Prophetie oder als Amulette. Warum sind sie hier, wo sie nur Staub ansammeln und vor den Augen der Leute verborgen sind?"
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Knochen der Toten sollten den Lebenden dienen. Man könnte sie für Riten nutzen oder für Prophetie oder als Amulette. Warum sind sie hier, wo sie nur Staub ansammeln und vor den Augen der Leute verborgen sind?"

languages.text: « Ces ossements devraient être au service des vivants. On pourrait les utiliser dans des rites, pour la divination ou encore sous forme d'amulettes. Que font-ils ici, à prendre la poussière, dissimulés aux regards de tous ? »
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces ossements devraient être au service des vivants. On pourrait les utiliser dans des rites, pour la divination ou encore sous forme d'amulettes. Que font-ils ici, à prendre la poussière, dissimulés aux regards de tous ? »

languages.text: «Los huesos de los muertos deberían servir a los vivos. Podrían usarse en ritos o adivinaciones, o como amuletos. ¿Por qué están aquí, acumulando polvo y ocultos a la vista?».
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: «Los huesos de los muertos deberían servir a los vivos. Podrían usarse en ritos o adivinaciones, o como amuletos. ¿Por qué están aquí, acumulando polvo y ocultos a la vista?».

languages.text: 「これらの死者の骨は、生きている人のために役立つべきよ。儀式やディビネーションに使ったり、お守りとして使ったりすることができるはず。なぜここでホコリを被って、人々の目から隠されているの？」
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: 「これらの死者の骨は、生きている人のために役立つべきよ。儀式やディビネーションに使ったり、お守りとして使ったりすることができるはず。なぜここでホコリを被って、人々の目から隠されているの？」

languages.text: “这些死者的遗骨本该为生者服务才对。这些骨头明明可以用来举行仪式、进行占卜，或者用来制作护身符，可为什么要藏在这里，不让任何人找到呢？”
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

traits.locale_text: “这些死者的遗骨本该为生者服务才对。这些骨头明明可以用来举行仪式、进行占卜，或者用来制作护身符，可为什么要藏在这里，不让任何人找到呢？”

languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"

languages.text: "Ölülerin kemikleri, yaşayanlara hizmet etmeli. Ayinlerde, kehanetlerde ya da uğurluk niyetiyle kullanılabilirler. Neden burada toz toplayıp insanların gözlerinden ırak kalsınlar?"
languages.original_text: "These bones of the dead should be serving the living. They could be used in rites or divinations, or as amulets. Why are they here, gathering dust and concealed from people's eyes?"
